00013 #if defined(WINDOWS)
00014 /*!\fn void u_sleep( __int64 usec) 
00015  *\brief u_sleep for windows
00016  *\param used Number of usec to sleep
00017  */
00018 void u_sleep( __int64 usec) 
00019 { 
00020                 HANDLE timer; 
00021                 LARGE_INTEGER ft; 
00022 
00023                 ft.QuadPart = -(10*usec); // Convert to 100 nanosecond interval, negative value indicates relative time
00024 
00025                 timer = CreateWaitableTimer(NULL, TRUE, NULL); 
00026                 SetWaitableTimer(timer, &ft, 0, NULL, NULL, 0); 
00027                 WaitForSingleObject(timer, INFINITE); 
00028                 CloseHandle(timer); 
00029 }
00030 #else
00031 /*!\fn void u_sleep( unsigned int usec) 
00032  *\brief wrapper around usleep for API consistency
00033  *\param usec Number of usec to sleep
00034  */
00035 void u_sleep( unsigned int usec ) 
00036 { 
00037                 usleep( usec );
00038 }
00039 #endif

00048 
00049                 char k[ 2 ] = "" ;
00050 
00051                 printf( "Press a enter to continue..." );
00052

00054                 scanf( "%c", k );

00061 /*!\fn int start_HiTimer( N_TIME *timer )
00062  *\brief Initialize or restart from zero any N_TIME HiTimer
00063  *\param timer Any N_TIMER *timer you wanna start or reset
00064  *\return TRUE or FALSE
00065  */
00066 int start_HiTimer( N_TIME *timer )
00067 {
00068                 /* set delta to 0 */
00069                 timer -> delta = 0;
00070 
00071 #if !defined( LINUX ) && !defined( SOLARIS ) && !defined( AIX )
00072                 if( QueryPerformanceFrequency( ( LARGE_INTEGER * ) & timer -> freq ) == 0 )
00073                                 return FALSE ;
00074                 if( QueryPerformanceCounter( &timer -> startTime ) == 0 )
00075                                 return FALSE ;
00076 #else
00077                 if( gettimeofday( &timer -> startTime, 0 ) != 0 )
00078                                 return FALSE ;
00079 #endif
00080 
00081                 return TRUE ;      
00082 } /* init_HiTimer(...) */
00083

00085 
00086 /*!\fn time_t get_usec( N_TIME  *timer )
00087  *\brief Poll any N_TIME HiTimer, returning usec, and moving currentTime to startTime
00088  *\param timer Any N_TIMER *timer you wanna poll
00089  *\return The elapsed number of usec for the given N_TIME *timer
00090  */
00091 time_t get_usec( N_TIME *timer )
00092 {
00093 #ifdef WINDOWS
00094                 QueryPerformanceCounter( ( LARGE_INTEGER * ) & timer -> currentTime );
00095                 timer -> delta = 1000000 * ( timer -> currentTime . QuadPart - timer -> startTime . QuadPart ) / timer -> freq . QuadPart ;
00096                 timer -> startTime = timer -> currentTime ;
00097 #else
00098                 gettimeofday( &timer -> currentTime, 0 );
00099                 timer -> delta = ( timer -> currentTime . tv_sec   - timer -> startTime . tv_sec  ) * 1000000 + ( timer -> currentTime . tv_usec  - timer -> startTime . tv_usec );
00100                 timer -> startTime . tv_sec  = timer -> currentTime . tv_sec ;
00101                 timer -> startTime . tv_usec = timer -> currentTime . tv_usec ;
00102 #endif
00103 
00104                 return timer -> delta;
00105 } /* get_usec( ... ) */
00106 
00107 
00108 
00109 /*!\fn time_t get_msec( N_TIME  *timer )
00110  *\brief Poll any N_TIME HiTimer, returning msec, and moving currentTime to startTime
00111  *\param timer Any N_TIMER *timer you wanna poll
00112  *\return The elapsed number of msec for the given N_TIME *timer
00113  */
00114 time_t get_msec( N_TIME *timer )
00115 {
00116 #ifdef WINDOWS
00117                 QueryPerformanceCounter( ( LARGE_INTEGER * ) & timer -> currentTime );
00118                 timer -> delta = 1000 * ( timer -> currentTime . QuadPart - timer -> startTime . QuadPart ) / timer -> freq . QuadPart ;
00119                 timer -> startTime = timer -> currentTime ;
00120 #else
00121                 gettimeofday( &timer -> currentTime, 0 );
00122                 timer -> delta = ( timer -> currentTime . tv_sec   - timer -> startTime . tv_sec  ) * 1000 + ( timer -> currentTime . tv_usec  - timer -> startTime . tv_usec ) / 1000 ;
00123                 timer -> startTime . tv_sec  = timer -> currentTime . tv_sec ;
00124                 timer -> startTime . tv_usec = timer -> currentTime . tv_usec ;
00125 #endif
00126 
00127                 return timer -> delta;
00128 } /* get_msec(...) */

00132 /*!\fn time_t get_sec( N_TIME  *timer )
00133  *\brief Poll any N_TIME HiTimer, returning sec, and moving currentTime to startTime
00134  *\param timer Any N_TIMER *timer you wanna poll
00135  *\return The elapsed number of sec for the given N_TIME *timer
00136  */
00137 time_t get_sec( N_TIME *timer ){
00138 #ifdef WINDOWS
00139                 QueryPerformanceCounter( ( LARGE_INTEGER * ) & timer -> currentTime );
00140                 timer -> delta = ( timer -> currentTime . QuadPart - timer -> startTime . QuadPart ) / timer -> freq . QuadPart ;
00141                 timer -> startTime = timer -> currentTime ;
00142 #else
00143                 gettimeofday( &timer -> currentTime, 0 );
00144                 timer -> delta = ( timer -> currentTime . tv_sec   - timer -> startTime . tv_sec  )  + ( timer -> currentTime . tv_usec  - timer -> startTime . tv_usec ) / 1000000 ;
00145                 timer -> startTime . tv_sec  = timer -> currentTime . tv_sec ;
00146                 timer -> startTime . tv_usec = timer -> currentTime . tv_usec ;
00147 #endif
00148                 return timer -> delta;
00149 }/* get_sec(...) */
